alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry; Stone; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 24 at 3:18AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST TODAY THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Alabama, including the following areas, Choctaw, Clarke, Mobile Central, Mobile Coastal, Mobile Inland and Washington and southeast Mississippi, including the following areas, George, Greene, Perry, Stone and Wayne. * WHEN...From noon CST today through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Multiple rounds of heavy rainfall are expected across the watch area through Thursday evening. Widespread rainfall totals of 2 to 4 inches are expected, with locally higher amounts of over 6 inches possible. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
